Azerbaijan is in a state of war. The war is not over yet. The first phase of the war is over.
Our army must be ready at any time to restore its territorial integrity in any way.
The Azerbaijani state and people will never allow the establishment of a second Armenian state on the territory of Azerbaijan.
Nagorno-Karabakh is the land of Azerbaijan and remains as the land of Azerbaijan.
Azerbaijan has spent a great deal of money for military purposes over the past few years.
Our military budget in 2003 was $ 163 million last year, reaching $ 3.6 billion this year and $ 3.7 billion this year.
We have acquired the most up-to-date techniques in recent years. Azerbaijan's weapons in recent years are modern weapons.
They are high-precision and very large-scale weapons. In recent years, about a hundred combat and transport helicopters have been purchased.
Fighter jets, the most up-to-date air defense equipment have been purchased.
These armored vehicles, the most up-to-date tanks, the most modern artillery equipment are capable of destroying any part of the enemy.
Strong Azerbaijan can talk with weak Armenia in any language.
We just prefer the way to negotiate to maintain stability in the region and region.
We multiply the enemy several times in any direction, over 10 times in some directions, and this difference will gradually increase.
In the last 10 years, there is no second country in the world, which is developing like Azerbaijan in terms of economic development.
Azerbaijan flag will fluctuate in Nagorno-Karabakh, other occupied territories, Khankendi, Shusha.
Today, the Azerbaijani Army is not only in the region but also in the world as a strong army - both military (cont) http://t.co/rCHsJEOKDp
As the Supreme Commander-in-Chief, I will continue to support the development of the army and the army.
We will achieve what we want in the settlement of the conflict, restore historical justice, and return to our native land!
History of development, progress of the history, processes in the world, strengthening Azerbaijan, weakening, poverty (cont) http://t.co/kaJOHlzjpH
We will further strengthen Azerbaijan. Our strong state will say its word in the settlement of this conflict.

Great to be speaking to the Akl Chamber of Commerce today on the Government’s plans to kick-start transport projects.
The National Government is backing Auckland and spending about a billion dollars a year on transport in the city.
National is backing Auckland with a new generation of transport projects – City Rail Link, 2nd Harbour Crossing and AMETI & East-West Link.
National will bring forward construction of three other major highway projects in Auckland. http://t.co/bI45M4OehJ
Here’s the future transport projects for Auckland I talked about in my speech today. http://t.co/p1AbBUVZf8
